title: 1 vs 9 map !!
body: how about riot doing a new map ...a map locks just like aurf but ..only one player will get the map buff and the other 9 will not ..he will also have some other helpfull buff like getting more xp and gold maybe so it will be kinda fair game play  a team of one player with the buffs vs the other normal 9 players ..tell me how u find it guys ..if u like it please vote for it ...
